#MHAM is here, and the AMF wants YOU to get involved. From participating in our #MHAMSocialChallenge every Wednesday to tuning in to our weekly Facebook Lives, your options are endless. Learn how to #MoveAgainstMigraine on our website. https://buff.ly/2JmLilp¬† pic.twitter.com/vGf7HDFqm6

For many of us, #migraine impacts the busiest years of our lives, robbing us of family relationships, friends, careers and economic stability.  Time for change! More  @daviddodick #MHAM "You are #NotAlone https://twitter.com/daviddodick/status/1002502568667439105¬†‚Ä¶

#Migraine is the 2nd leading cause of years lived with disability in the world and #1 in those between 15-49! Enough already - time for collective action is now. @amfmigraine https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5821623/¬†‚Ä¶
